data.prayer: Spirit, of the 1,041,167 people in the state of Anzoátegui who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Anzoátegui, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Anzoátegui.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Anzoátegui, Venezuela to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Anzoátegui, Venezuela today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Anzoátegui, Venezuela to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,298,211 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,477,900 people living in the state of Anzoátegui.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Anzoátegui, Venezuela.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Anzoátegui, Venezuela has a population of 1,477,900.

We estimate Anzoátegui has 179,689 people who might know Jesus, 1,041,167 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 257,044 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Anzoátegui
location.cities_list: Barcelona, Puerto La Cruz, El Tigre, Anaco, San José de Guanipa
